question: Who has been appointed as the President of the Indian Steel Association (ISA)?
explanation:
Veteran in Indian Steel Industry, CEO of Arcelor Mittal Nippon Steel India, Dilip Oommen took over as the President of the Indian Steel Association (ISA). 
Earlier, T V Narendran the Managing director of Tata Steel, resigned from the post of President of ISA. An extra-ordinary board meeting decided the unanimous appointment of Dilip Oommen as the President for the next two years.
